text: Apani ki dekhate pana na ye, allahâ€Œ tomadera kalyane niyojita karechena [1] prthibite ya kichu ache sesabake ebam tamra nirdese sagare bicaranasila nauyanasamuhake? Ara tini'i asamanake [2] dhare rakhena yate ta pare na yaya yaminera upara tamra anumati chara. Niscaya allahâ€Œ manusera prati snehaprabana, parama dayalu
